level.heading: COMPROMISE OF CONTRACT DEBT COLLECTIONS (ยง 27-3237)

level.text: For debts under ten thousand dollars ($10,000), excluding interest, if further collection is not practical or would cost more than the amount of recovery, the Director may compromise the debt or terminate or suspend further collection action.

The Director shall not compromise any debt involving fraud. However, the Director may suspend collection action under this section, regardless of fraud, if the Attorney General determines that the cost of collection would exceed the amount of recovery.
